name: Mop Boy Demo but better
description:
Mom and Dad have finally put Mop Boy in charge of keeping their beloved pizzeria clean. But with grease monsters running amuck and a crooked health inspector on their tail, it's gonna take the whole family to keep the restaurant afloat.

(PLease don't kill us for copying the rest from our old demo)

The game centers around Mop Boy, a kid whose family owns and lives above a pizza restaurant, Doughboys (based on our team member’s family-owned restaurant of the same name).  While the other members of the Boy family have normal restaurant jobs (running deliveries, cooking, taking orders), he’s left battling the grease lingering from the daily grind. Upstairs, Mop unwinds and replenishes lost health while bonding with his family.

Controls:

  • Movement: arrow keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Action/ Attack: F
  • Charge Attack: Hold F
  • Pause / View Mission: Esc

Follow us on Twitter: twitter.com/MopBoyGame and Instagram!: instagram.com/mopboygame
